text: Frequency of complications (as % of all complications) Pneumonia 9.3% Pulmonary atelectasis 7.4% Urinary tract infection 53% Wound infection 43 % Pneumothorax 31% Urinary retention 1.0% lleus 1.0% Pleural effusion 0.9 % Intra-abdominal haematoma 0.5% Pulmonary embolus 04 % Wound herniation 03 % Splenectomy 02% Deep venous thrombosis 02% Intra-abdominal abscess 0.2% Other unspecified 53% Fig 8 Frequency of complications.
